synopsis.text: The protagonist, Arata Kasuga, is on the brink of expulsion due to his dismal academic performance. To avoid this fate, he must delve into the mysterious world of the Trinity Seven's magical archives. Each of the seven enigmatic girls will impart their unique knowledge to him, offering a lifeline to his sinking academic ship. Will this unconventional education be enough to save him from expulsion and unveil the secrets of the magical archives? Join Arata on his thrilling journey of self-discovery and magical enlightenment in this exciting anime series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
